Digital Initiatives Librarian
description: I am coming to the University of Idahoâ€™s Digital Initiatives Librarian position from a background in Digital Media Management, Archiving and Multimedia production. My experience in digital storytelling has helped me find ways to create engaging and interactive experiences for readers through digital exhibits, online publishing and audio documentaries. My goal is to balance user engagement and knowledge comprehension in a multidisciplinary approach, which creates visual, auditory and textual access points that provide assistive technology to every potential user, regardless of their learning preferences.

title: Unit Head for Digital Scholarship and Open Strategies; Digital Infrastructure Librarian
description: Despite a background in Art History, Classical Studies, and Archives, he always manages to get involved in all things digital--especially websites, digitization, and digital preservation. At the library he works with Digital Scholarship and Open Strategies to bring cool projects, enlightening workshops, and innovative services to life.
